name: 西蒙·基利克
introduction: Simon began his training  5 years ago. He studies with Coach/Director/Actor Zoe Nathenson (www.zoenathenson.com), she has more than 20 years experience in the Film/TV industry working with actors such as Bob Hoskins, Al Pacino and Directors including Mike Figgis, Ridley Scott and Neil Jordan.Simon has been professionally working for four years with nine shorts, two feature films and over twenty international commercials. This year Simon appeared in the BBC Drama "The Song of Lunch" with Oscar winning actress Emma Thompson and BAFTA Award winner Alan Rickman. Most recently he has just finished work on the highest rating British TV series EastEnders.
